Articles.Content:
***Reaaalllllly not trying to spam. Please tell me where you think this post should go if not here***

Hey all,

Was on the Subreddit recently and came across <a href ="http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/1rxpnv/to_all_those_ksp_movie_makers/"> this post. </a>

This got me thinking of how many composers there are out there, and maybe there should be an Original Music Thread. Maybe something like this already exists, but I figured I'd try anyway. Here is some of my stuff for anyone who is looking for some different music.

http://harlanmuir.bandcamp.com/album/spaaace

Who else has their own compositions?

H-Town
